translations: 干涸沟壑（arroyo 的名词复数）

sentences.sentence: Rocky mesas, canyons and arroyos break up the monotony of kilometers of shifting dunes.
sentences.translation: 岩石台地、峡谷和旱谷点缀在绵延几千公里的流动沙丘中。

sentences.sentence: He liked to position structures over waterfalls, on steep slopes, at the bottom of arroyos.
sentences.translation: 他喜欢将建筑物置于瀑布上方，或者陟峭的斜坡处，或者是沙漠底部。
